statements: SELECT * FROM cyberbullying_reports WHERE reported_user_id = 12345;
SELECT report_id, report_type, report_date FROM cyberbullying_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM cyberbullying_reports WHERE report_type = 'Harassment' AND report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT reported_user_id, COUNT(report_id) AS total_reports FROM cyberbullying_reports GROUP BY reported_user_id HAVING COUNT(report_id) > 5;
SELECT report_id, reported_text FROM cyberbullying_reports WHERE LENGTH(reported_text) > 100 ORDER BY report_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM cyberbullying_reports WHERE report_type = 'Harassment' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, reported_user_id FROM cyberbullying_reports WHERE report_type = 'Cyberbullying' AND reported_user_id = 101 ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT report_id, report_date, reported_text FROM cyberbullying_reports WHERE reported_user_id = 202 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM cyberbullying_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY report_date ASC, reported_user_id DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_type, reported_user_id FROM cyberbullying_reports WHERE reported_text LIKE '%threat%' ORDER BY report_date DESC, reported_user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM cyberbullying_reports;
SELECT report_id, report_date, report_text FROM cyberbullying_reports WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT report_date, report_text FROM cyberbullying_reports WHERE report_text LIKE '%offensive%';
SELECT * FROM cyberbullying_statistics ORDER BY stat_date DESC;
SELECT stat_category, SUM(stat_value) AS total_value FROM cyberbullying_statistics GROUP BY stat_category;
SELECT * FROM cyberbullying_reports WHERE report_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT report_id, report_text FROM cyberbullying_reports WHERE report_text LIKE '%cyberbullying%' ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT stat_category, SUM(stat_value) AS total_value FROM cyberbullying_statistics GROUP BY stat_category ORDER BY total_value DESC
SELECT * FROM cyberbullying_statistics WHERE stat_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND stat_value > 100 ORDER BY stat_value ASC
SELECT report_id, report_date, LENGTH(report_text) AS text_length FROM cyberbullying_reports WHERE LENGTH(report_text) > 500 ORDER BY text_length DESC, report_date ASC
SELECT * FROM reports;
SELECT report_id, report_date, report_description FROM reports WHERE report_type = 'Monthly';
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_role = 'Admin';
SELECT incident_date, reporter_id, offender_id FROM incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT incident_description FROM incidents WHERE reporter_id = 1234 AND offender_id = 5678;
SELECT * FROM reports WHERE report_type = 'Financial' AND report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_id, report_date, report_description FROM reports ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_role = 'Admin' ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, reporter_id, offender_id FROM incidents WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT incident_description FROM incidents WHERE reporter_id = 101 AND offender_id = 102;
SELECT * FROM reports;
SELECT report_type, report_date FROM reports;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users;
SELECT * FROM incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT trend_date, trend_description FROM trends WHERE trend_category='Finance';
SELECT * FROM reports WHERE report_type = 'financial' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_type, report_description FROM reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY report_date ASC;

SELECT users.username, incidents.incident_date, incidents.incident_description FROM users JOIN incidents ON users.user_id = incidents.user_id WHERE users.username = 'JohnDoe' ORDER BY incidents.incident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM trends WHERE trend_category IN ('technology', 'healthcare') ORDER BY trend_date DESC;
SELECT reports.report_id, reports.report_description, users.username FROM reports JOIN users ON reports.report_id = users.user_id ORDER BY reports.report_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Reports
SELECT report_title, report_date FROM Reports ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE join_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM Posts WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT trend_topic FROM Trends
SELECT * FROM Reports WHERE report_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_title, report_description FROM Reports WHERE report_id = 5;
SELECT report_id, report_title, report_date FROM Reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Users JOIN Posts ON Users.user_id = Posts.user_id;
SELECT comment_content, comment_date FROM Comments WHERE comment_id > 10;
